newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Multibras still a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Multibras still a buy.

text.p: -- Credit Lyonnais Securities said it maintained its buy recommendation on Brazilian appliance-maker Multibras and raised its 1996 and 1997 earnings estimates for the firm.
-- "Although we are a little cautious with earnings growth ahead, we are maintaining our buy recommendation on Multibras with a near-term price target of 2.00 reais," it said.
-- The bank said it revised upward its 1996 earnings estimate to 227.7 million reais, or 0.21 reais per share, from 117.2 million reais, or 0.11 reais per share.
-- For 1997 the estimate was raised to 238.3 million reais, or 0.22 reais per share, from 151.6 million reais, or 0.14 reais per share, it said.
-- Despite a doubling in Multibras's share price in the year-to-date, the stock is still attractive, regardless of accounting method, the bank said.
-- It said the firm is well positioned in a growing industry and is preparing for stronger domestic competition as well as expansion through South America with partner Whirlpool Corp.
-- Multibras preferred was down 0.01 at 1.52 reais at 1500 local/1800 GMT on the Sao Paulo bourse.
